column4: HELP. I let my one laptop's battery die today while it was booted into ubuntu without relising it, and when i came back i logged in fine but neither metacity nor my panels came up!
did that, it brought metacity back, not my panals
ok, i did that aand it says "gnome-panal: no process found
this problem has persisted accross reboots
somehow gnome-panal appeaars too have been uninstalled/corrupted
There is apparently ppa for it.
i mentioned several peices of software, too many for "it" too be relevent..
you can try this, no source, just ready ubuntu package: http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2010/09/login-to-ubuntu-using-your-face/
that is not what i want.. at least not directly.
